Legal_Issue: Jurisdiction of adjudicator under the Canada Labour Code
Decision_Outcome: Adjudicator's decision quashed due to bias and unreasonableness
Legal_Rule: Jurisdiction exists if employment is 'in or in connection with a federal work, undertaking or business' (s. 167(1) of the Canada Labour Code)
Outcome_on_Merits: Not reached due to procedural issues
Key_Evidence_Considered: Nature of employment with Indian Band council
